sentence.Network_en: He was unique in the sweep of his imagination, the nimbleness of his intellect.
sentence.Network_cn: 唯独他视野广阔, 思想敏捷.

sentence.Network_en: A little wit, a little nimbleness , a little luck - time and opportunity - these sometimes availed.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些机智, 一些儿伶俐, 一些儿运气--时间和机会 -- 这些东西有时候会奏效的.

sentence.Network_en: Will this nimbleness and enthusiasm suffice to wire up the roughly 3 m homes without fast broadband?
sentence.Network_cn: 大约300家没有快速宽带足以有灵活的连接和热情了 吧 ?
